detectors.description: XCOk.restoreTokens(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/XCOk.sol#386-394) ignores return value by token.transfer(msg.sender,_restoreBalance) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/XCOk.sol#392)

Reentrancy in XCOk.restoreTokens(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/XCOk.sol#386-394):
	External calls:
	- token.transfer(msg.sender,_restoreBalance) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/XCOk.sol#392)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- RestoreTokens(_token,_restoreBalance) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/XCOk.sol#393)
detectors.markdown:
